question: Should I check it out with a doctor?  4/13 my wrist started to hurt and by bedtime I noticed the joint was swollen.  I have type 2 diabetes and my blood sugar is under control, I did swim for over an hour that morning and I didn't hit or lift anything to injury my wrist.  Just think I should wait a few days to see if it goes away.
title: Joint paint in the wrist or bone
